artist: Unknown artist, British, 19th century; Publisher: Messrs Fores, London
inscription:
Printed inscription at left-hand edge of first panel: Messrs. Fores at their Sporting & Fine Print Repository / 41, Piccadilly, Corner of Sackville St.

A second inscription at the right-hand edge of the final panel: (same information as above, but in French)
markings: Publisher's inscription in Englsih and French
medium: Hand-colored etchings, aquatint and roulette, accordion-fold panorama
provenance: Mrs. Charles C. Bovey, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1940.
text: Commemoration of the 1838 coronation of Queen Victoria (1819-1901) of Great Britain.
title: Fores' Grand Coronation Procession
